The  div tag `<div>`  divides the HTML document into sections of content. This div tag `<div>` is used to group together HTML elements, allowing you to apply CSS styles to many elements at once.

short_description:
Div
The  div tag <div>  divides the HTML document into sections of content. This div tag <div> is used to group together HTML elements, allowing you to apply CSS styles to many elements at once.
tips:
* Use `<div>` to set a section in an HTML document and groups elements for formatting with class or id attributes.
* Any sort of content can be put inside the `<div>` tags, such as text, list, images, etc.
